trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted> event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>-hendelse når en Insert-knappen (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Insert") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en insert-operasjonen når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å bestemme antall poster som er påvirket, og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå antall poster som er berørt av innsetting av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>til å fastslå om unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger tilgang til verdiene for innsatte oppføringen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen returnerer modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>etter at du har en insert-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in insert mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Skal beholdes i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere i insert-modus, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>klasse, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>| Verdien for den `affectedRows` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>| <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>-Objekt i den `e` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>| Initialisert til `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>| Initialisert til `false`. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception raised when the insert operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som representerer det oppstod et unntaket under innsetting ble utført.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If no exception was raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, bruker du <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> for denne parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor mange rader som er berørt av insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen AffectedRows til å finne ut hvor mange rader som påvirkes av insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes vanligvis til å bekrefte at riktig antall rader ble satt inn.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntaket (Hvis noen) som oppstod under innsetting.

trans-unit.source: Use the Exception property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk unntak-egenskapen til å fastslå unntaket (Hvis noen) som oppstod under innsetting.

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, denne egenskapen returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det oppstod et unntak, og du vil behandle unntak i hendelsesbehandlingen, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen `true`; ellers unntaket er sendt til neste metode i kallstakken for behandling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som representerer unntak oppstod under innsetting.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et unntak som oppstod under innsetting ble behandlet i behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen ExceptionHandled som viser om unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet når det oppstår et unntak under innsetting.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, unntaket regnes håndtert og er ikke sendt flere opp kallstakken.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false`, unntaket er sendt til neste metode i kallstakken for behandling.

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå hvilke unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen skal være i insert-modus etter en insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen returnerer modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the KeepInInsertMode property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk KeepInInsertMode-egenskapen til å angi om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen skal være i insert-modus etter en insert-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in insert mode, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Vil beholde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere i insert-modus må du angi denne egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property should be used when you want to want to override the default mode only occasionally.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen skal brukes når du vil vil overstyre standardmodus bare noen ganger.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen må være i insert-modus som standard må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>skal være i insert-modus etter en insert-operasjonen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste som inneholder feltet Navn/verdi-par for innsatte oppføringen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen verdier for å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene for innsatte oppføringen.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre innsatte poster.

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verdier returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekter som representerer feltene i oppføringen innsatte.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltet verdier direkte.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder en ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par for innsatte oppføringen.
